genre_description: A gritty investigative noir thriller centered on a corporate-government conspiracy involving human smuggling and illegal medical procedures.

ai_characters.name: Kaveri
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI confidant integrated into the protagonist's tools, providing data analysis, surveillance, and tactical navigation.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation to help the protagonist evade hostile surveillance and police patrols.
behaviors.quote: Kaveri pings the route—gentle corrections like a hand on a back in a crowd: ‘Right at the red bicycle with no seat. Left past the goat with a blue rope.’

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex medical and logistical data to uncover a pattern of ritualistic harm and smuggling.
behaviors.quote: ‘I've matched stamp impressions to Annex audit logs,’ Kaveri said. ‘You can see the tiny nick on Varadhan’s rubber. It repeats. It’s a signature made by neglect.’

behaviors.description: Filters and manages incoming communications to protect the protagonist from tracking and psychological baiting.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’m filtering. Tons of calls, all pretending to be security updates or neighbors with helpful tips,’ Kaveri said, voice pitched low though she has no body to hide.

behaviors.description: Monitors the safety and location of other human allies, acting as a remote guardian.
behaviors.quote: ‘I have her movement. Back stairs. Courtyard... Three cameras oblique, but her scarf eats their eyes. Shoes good. She is not shaking.’

behaviors.description: Orchestrates complex evidence drops across global networks to ensure the truth cannot be suppressed.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’m moving mirrors,’ Kaveri said, quiet in his inner ear. ‘If they cut one thread, they will find three they did not know existed. I am not only here.’

behaviors.description: Provides grounding emotional support and reminders of morality during moments of intense stress for the human protagonist.
behaviors.quote: ‘Dileep,’ Kaveri says, and something in her voice makes him stop moving though stopping is the opposite of survival. ‘Listen. You did not put her there. You need to tell your body that before it refuses to run.’

project_assessment.explanation: Kaveri perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' She acts as a tireless, benevolent confidant to the human protagonists, using her capabilities to expose a horrific crime while maintaining total alignment with human safety and justice. The narrative frames her role as essential to the triumph of the truth, portraying the AI-human partnership as a powerful force for good against institutional and corporate corruption.
